data.name: Affliction Breakout Edition DLC
data.detailed_description:
Affliction

Breakout Edition DLC:
  • Digital Game Guide - A Guide That Helps Familiarize Players With The Game World!
  • Digital Artbook - Game Art Which Can Be Used As Desktop Backgrounds & Printed!
  • Original Soundtrack - Several Original Tracks By Artists Christopher McDonough and Steven Wilcer That Were Created And Used Specifically For The Game!
data.about_the_game:
Affliction

Breakout Edition DLC:
  • Digital Game Guide - A Guide That Helps Familiarize Players With The Game World!
  • Digital Artbook - Game Art Which Can Be Used As Desktop Backgrounds & Printed!
  • Original Soundtrack - Several Original Tracks By Artists Christopher McDonough and Steven Wilcer That Were Created And Used Specifically For The Game!
data.short_description:
Affliction Breakout Edition:
This DLC includes game concept art, desktop backgrounds, an original soundtrack, and a digital game guide.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Microsoft Windows (32-bit/64-bit)
  • Processor: Intel Dual-Core 2GHz or AMD Dual-Core 2GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 400 series or AMD Radeon HD 6000 series, 1GB Video Card (Minimum Shader Model 2.0)
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Storage: 50 MB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX Compatible
  • Additional Notes: Base game may run on systems with lower specs, but with poor performance
